name: Neometry (Daniel Clark)
description:
In Neometry you must attempt to reach the highest score possible.

Click and drag your mouse to set the trajectory and power of your launch, then release to send yourself flying through the empty abyss.

Collide with different shapes to gain more points, and change the shape of yourself. But beware, hitting a matching shape will cause you to lose points and health!.

The less matching shapes you hit, the more points you'll have by the end. So pay close attention to where you channel your destructive energy!
